item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>I just think it's a cool app. </p>
item.content:encoded: I just think it’s a cool app.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Right, preparing myself for contact from Ed here, but my company is a Business Partner and has purchased the Software Access Option <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html"</a> rel="nofollow"><a href="http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html</a></a> this allows me to run a Domino Utility Server which handles the authenticated access to the application. And because I am hosting the server myself at the moment, mail sending is handled outside Domino anyway. I guess if / when the application grows to a point where it needs dedicated hosting then I'll need to talk to my IBM rep to find out the best option for the future.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Right, preparing myself for contact from Ed here, but my company is a Business Partner and has purchased the Software Access Option http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html“ rel=”nofollow”>http://www-304.ibm.com/jct09002c/isv/welcome/guide/sao.html this allows me to run a Domino Utility Server which handles the authenticated access to the application. And because I am hosting the server myself at the moment, mail sending is handled outside Domino anyway. I guess if / when the application grows to a point where it needs dedicated hosting then I’ll need to talk to my IBM rep to find out the best option for the future.

Matt

item.title: By: Adeleida
item.dc:creator: Adeleida
item.description: <p>VERY cool indeed. I'm testing it a bit, b.t.w. How are you getting past licensing issues?</p>
item.content:encoded: VERY cool indeed. I’m testing it a bit, b.t.w. How are you getting past licensing issues?
